column2: "Wow, what's with all this wreckage? I wonder what caused this."
"Um, excuse me, but... I just want to thank you..."
"Ah! Please wait! Please hear me out!"
"It's no use. They ran off into this little hole."
"He was really shaking, wasn't he? I guess he was pretty scared..."
"He did look like he was frightened by something. That's probably why he ran away."
"But I didn't mean to frighten him. Oh, what to do now?"
"...Okay. No really, I'm okay. I can't let myself get down when I need to keep trying."
"That's enough for now. Let's head back, <%me>."
"It's fine. I'm certainly not giving up!"

"
Fourier can now be called as a partner.
"
